about_the_game:
-STORY & GAMEPLAY

Cybernetic Titan takes places immediately after the end of the Original Super Incursion when Operation: Winter Strike is declared successful. You are Protagonist Sergeant: John Kozack part of IMS ( Incursion Military Service ) a foreign private military organization which has come to Gemstone Island to combat the Con-Federation of Global Terrorism (CGT) and has now established a few bases there, You are working together with your teammate Corporal: Sebastian McGregor in a desperate attempt to survive, You must fight off and survive guerilla warfare waves of the CGT the Terrorist Organization trying to destroy you and anyone who wants to stand in its way of taking over the world and maintaining full control of it. When you defeat all 23 waves you can both evacuate to safety. The CGT have launched a global virus genocide which has killed over 80% of the world's Human population crippling all of the worlds super powers and turning the whole world into a Post-Apocalypse Overgrown Dystopia. The Con-Federation Arrived in Gemstone Island in an Illegal Invasion spearheaded by MAJOR Nickolai Patrikov, They murdered Communist President Johnson Lincoln and all his cabinet and quickly over threw the Gemstone Island National Defense, National police and took control of the Island nation, They began staging Protocol 87 and hunting down any remaining Communist Government Officials, Protocol 87 is the Protocol the IMS and Gemstone Communist People's Defense Ministry Executed Operation Winter Strike to try and prevent. If the Con-Federation succeeds, CGT Supreme General: John Voorhies the leader of the Con-Federation will rule and be the most powerful man on EARTH, ruling the world with fear and death all those who stand in his way die. Sergeant: John Kozack is 29 Years old and has been serving in the IMS for 7 years, He specializes as a Ground Assault Infantry, He lost his father in the first attack orchestrated by the Con-Federation that event amplified his Anger and Hatred for the CGT. He has since decided to participate in multiple operations devised by Gemstone Island's Communist Ministry of Defense and I.M.S. to sabotage operations of CGT and assassinate its Senior commanding officers Who's direct orders have lead to the deaths and demise of many innocent people.

-SURVIVAL GAMEMODES

Cybernetic Titan is a First-Person Survival Shooter set in Gemstone Island's Capital: Advanced City, It has multiple different survival maps to choose from where you fight 23 waves of enemies in a map with weapons of your choice,, Survival takes 1-2 hours on average to beat all 23 waves of enemies on a chosen map. You start on wave 1 must kill all GTC enemies arriving on your location to kill you to reach the next wave beating waves unlocks new weapons and equipment which you can equip, when you reach wave 23 you and Corporal McGregor will escape the location to safety and then you can choose another location to survive in. Firearms in are fully customizable with multiple modern day sights and scope attachments Examples: Red Dot sight, Holographic sight, Kobra Sight, Pistol Reflex Sight, Extended Mag & Drum mag.

-WEAPONS

Cybernetic Titan includes both Modern Day & World War 2 Guns & Bombs the following is list of weapons you can expect to use in Cybernetic Ttian: Ak-47, M16, AUG, As-Val, VSS, G36C, UMP, Makarov, Skorpion, P90, Ballistic Knife, Type 99 Nambu, Flash Bang ,Pipe Bomb, Molotov ETC.

content_descriptors.notes: Enemies Scream, Player Spills Blood On The Floor, Enemies Bleed, Enemies Spill Blood On The Floor, Enemies Splatter Blood On Walls. HUD Blood Splatters As Player Damage Indicators.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8 & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3rd Generation
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4000 HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Use Of An SSD As Opposed To An HDD, Microsoft Redistributable 2019, DirectX 9 (2010)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 & Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 5th Generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX Geforce 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Use Of An SSD As Opposed To An HDD, Microsoft Redistributable 2019, DirectX 9 (2010)

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Drogas lícitas

short_description: First-Person Action Round-Survival Shooter, The IMS Cybernetic Titan Duo: SGT Kozack And CPL Sebastian Have To Survive Guerilla Warfare Attacks By The Con-Federation Of Global Terrorism Sent By High Ranking CGT Officer MAJOR: Nickolai Patrikov Who Wants To Kill Them For Sabotaging Protocol 87.
